```{r}
library(tidyverse)

```

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
weather_clean <- read_csv("../../data/raw/weather_clean.csv") %>%
  janitor::clean_names()
weather_clean$date <- as.Date(weather_clean$date_in_year - 1, origin = "2021-01-01")

temp <- ggplot(weather_clean, aes(x = date)) +
  geom_linerange(aes(
    ymin = record_low,
    ymax = record_high),
    color = "#ECEBE3") +
  geom_linerange(aes(
    ymin = normal_low,
    ymax = normal_high),
    color = "#C8B8BA") +
  geom_linerange(aes(
    ymin = low,
    ymax = high),
    color = "#A90248") +
  scale_x_date(
    date_labels = "%b",        # Short month names (Jan, Feb, ...)
    date_breaks = "1 month"    # Tick every month
  ) +
  theme_classic() +
  theme(axis.title = element_blank(),
    axis.text.y = element_text(size = 8),
    axis.text.x = element_text(size = 9),
    panel.grid = element_blank())
```
